BIO

Hi! I am Luna, a self-taught junior web developer, with some experience in front-end. My background in sciences and mathematics has learned me to work proactively and efficiently. I am capable of well-structured mindful work, both independently as well as in team setting, and bear in mind to finish tasks on time.


I am fueled by my passion for understanding how websites work, both the design and what is behind all of it. I consider myself a "forever student", eager to both build on my academic foundations in web development and stay in tune with the latest technologies through continued professional development. I desire to become multi-faceted and I cultivate a mindset to constantly upskill myself, and hope to learn to deliver results quickly with a toolkit that constitutes the most efficient tools in the industry, enabling smart and fast work.
